item.title: Real Skillcape Colors {No Summoning}
item.dc:creator: @Call_of_Duty Call of Duty
item.description:
@Call_of_Duty wrote:

[quote=“i_own_pking, post:4, topic:193149”][quote author=Call of Duty link=topic=257118.msg2137255#msg2137255 date=1206580219]

Give me some credits? I was the first person to release all right colours, with my colour dump…

These are the EXACT colours, which is not exactly possible to get without dumping…
[/quote]Really? I was under the impression that you released a shit dump, not right colors, and someone else dumped it, give me one moment please.

[QUOTE=Yarnova;412302]These are the actual Class8 Codes for all skillcapes and hoods directly from the jagex update server (Not from zee_best’s glitched dump).
The descriptions didn’t get retreived from the update server, i’m still working to fix that… But everything else is perfect, this even includes the real item IDs of the items.

Note: You may need to change item IDs, model IDs, and add ground and inventory options.

The codes combined into one post is so much text google won’t let me post it.
Download Link: http://rapidshare.com/files/94425849/Skillcapes_and_Hoods_by_Yarnova.txt.html[/QUOTE]

No, I do not think I need to credit you, correct me if I’m wrong.

Lol, yarnova thinks he knows alot more than he does, all my skill cape colours were perfect, and hoods, the only one that fucked up was summoning, that was because Jagex moved their data, thats also the reason why you cannot use a model grabber at the moment…

Also, T X leeched my dumper and changed the name, and all you’ve done anyway is leech the code out of someone else’s client, so shh.[/quote]I actually DID take this from SWAT client, and I said credits earlier, but I forgot that all credits are wrong here. I did however fix the glitch w/ strength hood + strength cape (t) + dragon chain + fishing cape (t), so whatever. This is for other people because I don’t care for rep, I hardly come here anyways, if you are correct, I really am sorry for being a bitch.

Read full topic

Give me some credits? I was the first person to release all right colours, with my colour dump…

These are the EXACT colours, which is not exactly possible to get without dumping…
[/quote]Really? I was under the impression that you released a shit dump, not right colors, and someone else dumped it, give me one moment please.

[QUOTE=Yarnova;412302]These are the actual Class8 Codes for all skillcapes and hoods directly from the jagex update server (Not from zee_best’s glitched dump).
The descriptions didn’t get retreived from the update server, i’m still working to fix that… But everything else is perfect, this even includes the real item IDs of the items.

Note: You may need to change item IDs, model IDs, and add ground and inventory options.

The codes combined into one post is so much text google won’t let me post it.
Download Link: http://rapidshare.com/files/94425849/Skillcapes_and_Hoods_by_Yarnova.txt.html[/QUOTE]

No, I do not think I need to credit you, correct me if I’m wrong.[/quote]

Lol, yarnova thinks he knows alot more than he does, all my skill cape colours were perfect, and hoods, the only one that fucked up was summoning, that was because Jagex moved their data, thats also the reason why you cannot use a model grabber at the moment…

Also, T X leeched my dumper and changed the name, and all you’ve done anyway is leech the code out of someone else’s client, so shh.

item.title: Real Skillcape Colors {No Summoning}
item.dc:creator: @Call_of_Duty Call of Duty
item.description:
@Call_of_Duty wrote:

Most clients have wrong skillcape colors, only a few out there are correct. Here are 100% fully working real color skill capes (and descriptions!):

http://www.mediafire.com/?1zytykme0b4

Also, if you wanted defenders and dragon full helm, looking correctly (fixed rotations) here you go:

[code]	if(i == 13595){

class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5];
class8.aStringArray189[1] = “Wield”;
class8.anIntArray156 = new int[2];
class8.anIntArray160 = new int[2];
class8.anIntArray156[0] = 28;
class8.anIntArray156[1] = 74;

class8.anInt197 = 116;

class8.aString170 = “Bronze defender”;
class8.aByteArray178 = “A defensive weapon.”.getBytes();
}

class8.anInt174 = 7205; //Model ID
class8.anInt181 = 789; //zoom increase will make it smaller
class8.anInt190 = 135; //model rotate up+down increase to move doen away from you
class8.anInt198 = 123; //model rotate side ways increase to move right in circle

class8.anInt194 = 0; //model offset increase to move up
class8.anInt204 = 24;
class8.anInt165 = 7204;//male wearing
class8.anInt200 = 7203;//female wearing
class8.anInt175 = -1;//Unknown
class8.aBoolean176 = false;//Stackable
class8.anInt164 = -1;//Female arms/sleeves
class8.anInt188 = -1;//male arms/sleeves
class8.aBoolean176 = false;//Stackable
class8.aString170 = “Dragon Full Helm”;//Name of the new item
class8.aByteArray178 = “Looks impressive and protects your head too.”.getBytes();//examin info
}[/code]

I do not post credits because credits are always wrong here.
